name: Milk & Honey Biscuit (SICK AF Adaptation)
description: Thought of using INW Biscuit instead of CAP Sugar Cookie. Haven't tried the original but I like the result, so here it is. Smooth, sweet-ish and very simple.
author: NikosD

reviews.text: GREAT Combo. Taste is excellent. After tasting this I used it in a recipe I am working on ....absolutely sick AF !!!!!  Thanks for this.
